QuestData.Title: Fuselight, Ho!
QuestData.Description: Hey, $r, listen up. I got a job opportunity that you aren't gonna want to miss out on.$b$bWe been sent up here from Fuselight, a new goblin town way down in the Badlands. Lots of money to be had down there, yes $g sir: ma'am;. And not nearly so many zombies... or uptight Argent paladin-types.$b$bNope, it's an untamed wilderness down there, and we're looking for someone like you to help us tame it. Whenever you're ready... we'll be waiting.
QuestData.LogDescription: Ride The Uncrashable to the Badlands, then report to Eddie Flofizzle.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Report to Eddie Flofizzle at Fuselight-by-the-Sea in the Badlands.
